questions.title: What are the first words uttered in the entire series, after a member of the Night's Watch discovers a big pile of corpses?

options.title: Whatever did it to them could do it to us.
What do you expect? They're savages.
It's the Wildlings - I've never seen the like.

questions.title: What were Jon Arryn's dying words to Robert Baratheon?

options.title: The night is dark and full of terrors.

questions.title: How did Ser Hugh of the Vale pop his clogs?

options.title: He fell off his horse and was trampled during a jousting tournament.
The Hound killed him with a sword during a jousting tournament.
The Mountain killed him with a splintered lance during a jousting tournament.

questions.title: When Bran Stark was ambushed by Osha and her kin, who killed the Wildling holding a knife to Bran's throat?
What is the name of the 'more elegant' execution device, used in the Vale of Arryn?
What happened to healer and wise woman Mirri Maz Duur?

options.title: Daenerys Targaryen had her burned alive on Drogo's funeral pyre.
Daenerys had her stabbed then burned on Drogo's funeral pyre.
She flung herself on to Drogo's funeral pyre.

questions.title: Immediately after Ned Stark loses his head, what do we see?
What is the name of the Wilding who routinely sacrifices his sons to the white walkers?
Night's Watch recruiter Yoren, who escorts Arya Stark out of King's Landing, tells her how he got revenge on his brother's killer. What was the killer's name and how did he die?

options.title: Willet - killed during a sword fight.
William - killed by a knife through the heart.
Willem - killed by an axe through the skull.

questions.title: Who did Jaime Lannister kill while he was Robb Stark's prisoner?
The prostitute, Ros, meets a grisly end when Joffrey Baratheon shoots her with a crossbow. Is she a?
Which creatures does Stannis Baratheon burn in front of Davos Seaworth as proof of Melisandre's magic?

results.title: Killing it!
